bandblog.models module

class MyBand.bandblog.models.Post(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: Model

This is a class representation of a simple blog entry.

Parameters:

  • title (str, optional) – A title for a blog post. This is a string with maximum length of 140 characters, defaults to None

  • body (str, optional) – The body text of the blog post. It has no length restrictions, defaults to None

  • date (str, optional) – Date of blog post entry Format of date is “Y-m-d”, defaults to current date
